DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the BOA(R)-Constricting IV Band is superior to standard methods for starting an IV.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Study of the BOA(R)-Constricting IV Band
DOC.detailed_description: We will test the hypothesis that paramedics and nurses treating in- and out-of-hospital patients with a BOA(R)-Constricting IV Band, compared to paramedics using standard treatment, will have better success rates for peripheral IV access.
DOC.criteria: Paramedics employed by the City of Houston or nurses employed by Memorial Hermann Hospital Texas Medical Center Agree to participate through written consent process City of Houston paramedics and Memorial Hermann Hospital Texas Medical Center nurses who do not provide written informed consent to participate
